item.description:
Come for the outdoor concert (7:15-8:30pm), bring your own picnic if you like, or have the buffet dinner (6:30pm, by Anna's Gourmet Catering).

Whether just concert, or buffet too, it is advisable to buy your tickets in advance.

If you want the buffet call immediately...technically we're already past the buffet deadline (sorry about that). Call 203-624-5189, ask for Arri (x15) or Colleen (x24).

If it rains concert will be indoors.

THE MUSIC: NHCer/professional pianist Alexis will be accompanying 3 amazing professional opera singers as they perform works by Verdi, Puccini, Ponchielli, and more:
- Tiffany Jackson (soprano), recently returned from performances in Europe (& the recent New Haven concert with Alexis)
- Daniel Juarez (tenor)...great voice, you've heard him if you've come to some of Alexis' past operatic concerts
- Cybil Juarez (mezzo)...also great, you may have heard her too at past concerts

Stage direction by Peter Webster, a director from the Houston Grand Opera. Chairs will be thrown, glasses smashed....

Concert only: $20; Concert + buffet: $37

Seating provided for all, not sure if picnickers can get a table too...the website tells picnickers to bring a blanket.

Arias include "Habanera" from Carmen, "Nessun dorma" from Turandot, the "Barcarolle" duet, and more works from Aida, Samson & Delilah, and more, including solos, duets, and trios.

POST-PARTY: Probably going out for drinks afterwards.

If you want to put this Event on your facebook calendar, click here

HOST: Alexis, cell 203-747-9203...probably best to text her...she'll be teaching all day and may be unable to answer the phone before the concert, but may be able to reply to text messages.

You can hear Alexis at her professional sites:
www.facebook.com/pages/Alexis-Zingale/41532426738 (this is her professional page, not her regular profile)
www.myspace.com/alexiszingalepianist

DIRECTIONS: For directions, click here

PARKING: Free street parking. Don't expect to find any on Audubon St itself though.
item.name: Tue 7/14 - Outdoor music (by Alexis) & song, + picnic, dinner, + drinks!
